content.rendered: LIBT-1R01 is a single board solution based on RSL10 chipset with Bluetooth Low Energy V5.0. LIBT-1R01 is an ultra−low−power, highly flexible multi−protocol 2.4 GHz radio specifically designed for use in high−performance wearable and medical applications. With its Arm® Cortex®−M3 Processor and LPDSP32 DSP core, LIBT-1R01 supports Bluetooth low energy technology and 2.4 GHz proprietary protocol stacks, without sacrificing power consumption.

excerpt.rendered:
• High Security Pairing
  • Supported custom BLE profile
  • Firmware OTA Support
  • Data Rate: 62.5 to 2000 kbps
  • Rx Sensitivity : -94 dBm
  • Dimension: 26.4mm x 13.97mm
